title: No own certificate prepared? Say no more!
subtitle: We prepared the tool below to sign your Self Description for testing purpose in the context of the Gaia-X Hackathon #4. No need for your own certificate. All you need is your Self Description.
titleSuccess: Find the signed Self Description here
titleFail: Signing failed, see the errors below

form.title: Sign your Self Description
form.subtitle: Input your self description and we will sign it with a deltaDAO test-key. Need inspiration for your self-descriptions? Check out our [participant self-description](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/deltaDAO/self-description-signer/main/config/self-description-examples/participant-self-description.json) and [service self-description](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/deltaDAO/self-description-signer/main/config/self-description-examples/service-offering-self-description.json) examples.
